Reference

All functions

add_age()

Keep age groups

add_weighted_efficacy()

Extract weighted efficacies

administer_first_dose()

Administer first doses

administer_second_dose()

Administer second doses

assign_doses()

Assign N doses to age groups based on weightings by number of people eligible to be vaccinated

beta_est_infectiousness()

Estimate beta parameter for explicit model

collapse_age()

Collapse age groups

coverage()

Estimate coverage by age group

default_durations()

Return the default hospital durations for modelling defined in squire For more info see https://mrc-ide.github.io/squire/articles/parameters.html

default_probs()

Return the default probabilities for modelling defined in squire For more info see https://mrc-ide.github.io/squire/articles/parameters.html

default_vaccine_pars()

Return the default vaccine parameters for modelling

eligable_for_second()

Identify those eligible for a second dose

extract_dose_number()

Extract dose numbers administers

format()

Format vaccine model output

format_internal()

Internals of Format vaccine model output as data.frame

init()

Check and set up initial values for vaccine model

nimue_deterministic_model()

nimue model creation.

p_all()

Prioritise all

p_elderly()

Prioritise Elderly

p_risk_elderly_working_children()

Prioritise Working age risk group > Elderly > working age > Children

p_risk_elderly_working_children_step()

Prioritise Working age risk group > Elderly > working age > Children in a stepwise fashion

p_working_elderly_children()

Prioritise Working > Elderly > Children

parameters()

Vaccine parameters

plot(<nimue_simulation>)

nimue simulation plot

run()

Run the vaccine model

strategy_matrix()

Prioritisation matrix

target_pop()

Target number of individual in each age group to vaccinate

weighted_efficacy()

Estimate weighted efficacies
